programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A brave husband is forced to defend his family as a crazed intruder threatens his life. A teenage girl clings to a tree to escape an alligator. Firefighters race to rescue a couple trapped in their house.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy is home alone when a group of robbers breaks into his house. Firefighters plan a dramatic water rescue when a woman's boat gets stuck at the top of a dam.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After being pursued by handsome Kevin Lewis, Amanda can't wait to marry her new man. But on their honeymoon, Amanda discovers a different side to Kevin — he likes things done a certain way.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a local deputy sheriff's pregnant daughter is shot and killed in her bed, the search for answers gets personal, as investigators suspect a killer close to home.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: What begins as an open-and-shut case spins into a full-on investigation when a mother and son are found dead in their home. Was this a murder/suicide, or could someone else have been responsible?

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: ATF Special Agents Dobyns and Kilday put their best feet forward only to have their lives put on the line. Once the investigation wraps, will they become targets for revenge?

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A couple go on a cruise to repair their marriage, but their week alone comes to a tragic end when her body falls from an upper deck. Is it an accident, or has something more sinister taken place?

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After a young woman is found dead in her bathtub, the investigation focuses in on her estranged husband and her boyfriend. An unexpected digital clue has one of them confessing to the murder.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: When a young college student disappears on her evening run, investigators scour her small town searching for her. And when her accused attacker, Cristhian Bahena Rivera takes the stand.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man with a dark past is brought into the interrogation room after a woman is murdered and a young girl vanishes.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an Army Sergeant is gunned down on New Year's Eve, investigators are at a loss on who would harm the beloved family man, until fellow soldiers in his unit confess shocking secrets to solve his murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: JaRay Wilson texted her mother just minutes before she vanished. For over a year, the teen's friends, family, and community searched for answers.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: The spirit of a departed child leaves its handprint on a couple's mirror. A ghost takes control of a willing paranormal investigator's neck. A woman spots what appears to be a mermaid in a local lake.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-aaralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagbibigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent fractions. These also explain lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. These also talk about identifying the elements, comparing, and contrasting information from stories and how to write it. The videos also teach about words, phrases, and setences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pag- unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the motion of objects, sources and uses of light, sound, heat and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-uri, pang-abay, pang-angkop, at mga sanggunian. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagsusuri ng kuwento at pagbuo ng mga tanong.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain about percent, polygons, circles, and solid figures. These also teach about sequence and solving simple equations, time, and circumference.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about different text-types and how to summarize it. These episodes also discuss about making a stand and how to provide evidence to support opinion or fact.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga pagbabago sa lipunan ng sinaunang Pilipino kabilang ang pagpupunyagi ng ilang pangkat na mapanatili ang kalayaan sa Kolonyalismong Espanyol at ang impluwensya nito sa kasalukuyang panahon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about motion in terms of distance and time. These also talk about how different objects interact with light and sound, heat; the effects of heat and electricity, light and sound on people and objects. These also focus on simple DC circuit and the relationship between electricity and magnetism in electromagnets.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang suprasegmental, pagbubuod, pagsusuri at paghahambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan. Tintalakay din dito ang tungkol sa paggamit ng angkop na pahayag at panandang anaporik at kataporik na pangngalan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts of geometry of shapes and sizes, and geometric relationships.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about using multi-media resources and oral language when giving information. These also teach about expressing one's belief, citing evidence, and raining thoughts in public forums.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
